diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with a 24-hour history of abdominal pain that began at the umbilicus and radiated to the right lower quadrant, worsening over time. Physical examination revealed tenderness in the right lower quadrant. A CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis showed a dilated appendix with an appendicolith, wall edema, and periappendiceal fat stranding, consistent with appendicitis.
